WRITING.TEXT: "Id rather go naked than wear the coat the world has made for me." Dorothy Allison

I absolutely cannot stand it when people crunch on ice. First of all it's loud and second of all it's cold af on your gums and teeth! My best friend does this, and somedays I just glare at her and wish her a thousand deaths.
2pac went to my high school for a hot sec and some of the older teachers who I had also had him. That's pretty cool
